description:
Why did BMA give this strangely-named trail a Coolness factor of 10?  Because, it's not every day your handling skills are tested by small pine trees slapping you silly like you're in a car wash!  This trail is just good clean fun (get it? carwash? clean? get it?), we dare you not to smile and get that "car wash" song from the 70's stuck in your head.

Use Carwash to connect between the Lollypop Loop and the Blue Dot Trail.
name: Carwash
